name: UrineAntigenTestForLegionellaPneumophilaOrStreptococcusPneumoniae
title: Urine antigen test for Legionella pneumophila or Streptococcus pneumoniae
purpose: (Clinical Focus: This value set contains codes which represent a urine antigen lab test for Legionella pneumophila.),(Data Element Scope: The intent of this data element is to identify patients who have had a urine antigen laboratory test for a Legionella pneumophila.  Using the Quality Data Model, this particular element will map to the "Laboratory test, performed datatype.),(Inclusion Criteria: Include codes representing a urine antigen test for Legionella pneumophila using the LOINC code system.),(Exclusion Criteria: None.)
